info.author: Mishbah Razzaque
info.description:
=============================
django-pulse
=============================

.. image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/django-pulse.png
    :target: https://badge.fury.io/py/django-pulse

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/mishbahr/django-pulse.png?branch=master
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/mishbahr/django-pulse

Monitoring Django Application Health over HTTP. 

Quickstart
----------

Install django-pulse::

    pip install django-pulse

Add it to your `INSTALLED_APPS`:

.. code-block:: python

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
        ...
        'django_pulse.apps.DjangoPulseConfig',
        ...
    )

Add django-pulse's URL patterns:

.. code-block:: python

    from django_pulse import urls as django_pulse_urls


    urlpatterns = [
        ...
        url(r'^', include(django_pulse_urls)),
        ...
    ]

Features
--------

* TODO

Running Tests
-------------

Does the code actually work?

::

    source <YOURVIRTUALENV>/bin/activate
    (myenv) $ pip install tox
    (myenv) $ tox




History
-------

0.1.0 (2016-12-04)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
